body:
so not a pretty traceback. but this seems ok.

```
In [15]: s = Series(range(3)).groupby(int).take([0])

In [16]: s = Series(range(3)).groupby(int).take([0], mode='INVALID')
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
ValueError: the 'mode' parameter is not supported in the pandas implementation of take()

During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred:

ValueError                                Traceback (most recent call last)
AttributeError: 'SeriesGroupBy' object has no attribute '_aggregate_item_by_item'

During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred:

ValueError                                Traceback (most recent call last)
```
